description: Comb. Mirror. High-heeled shoe. The clues have come together, and Kai has finally figured out the mystery behind the killer tracking Tokyo date girls. But will it do the teenaged boy any good against a magical killer who's now set his sights on him?
name: Bedtime Stories (Part 3)

description:
Overview:

Tensions escalate quickly into a full-scale riot, and Abi is forced into a difficult decision: to save others or to save herself? As the battle on the surface boils over, Abi and Michael escape underground. Will the path to A-Ree-Yass-I finally reveal itself, or will the Sunners remain ensnared in Newbegin?
name: Escape From The Killing Fields

description:
Overview

Perhaps there is no end to their war... but this is the beginning. MEGATRON begins his fateful march on the road of conquest, flanked by STARSCREAM and SOUNDWAVE. A final, devastating showdown with SENTINEL PRIME seals the origin of MEGATRON, sees the naming of THE DECEPTICONS and unleashes the opening shots of the war without end! By Eric Holmes and the artist of the TRANSFORMERS MOVIE ADAPTATION, Alex Milne. Marcelo Matere once again provides a variant cover.

In a devastating vision of tomorrow, the apocalypse comes to the WildStorm Universe in this special written by Wizard Magazines 2007 Writer to Watch, Christos Gage! The Wildcats Void mysteriously returns and transports the Midnighter to a not-so-distant future in which has been destroyed by the crashed wreckage of the Authoritys dimension-shifting Carrier! Have his teammates survived? And is the Midnighter seeing a vision of things to come, or can this devastation be averted?
name: A Failed World

Overview

While Gina and her group continue preparing to find a Giga-Engine deep below the monstrous Labyrinth, Julia and Debra have reached New York City to claim vengeance on the ninja assassin Zero. They haven't counted on the intervention of the immortal Ancient Daishior Zero's supposedly dead master, Gothwrain!

person_credits.name: Fred Perry
person_credits.role: writer, artist, penciler, letterer, inker, colorist, cover

description:
Overview

Gina and her group finally embark on their trek through the titanic golem/prison/nature preserve Labyrinth. But the monsters within were already the worst Earth had to offer in the Age of Magic, and they've been evolving ever since. Even the might and magic of Dr. Diggers, Dee'em, Monty and Shinryuken may not be enough to handle them!

person_credits.name: Fred Perry
person_credits.role: writer, editor, artist, penciler, letterer, inker, colorist, cover, other

description:
Overview

Gina and Penny are hopelessly lost in Labyrinth, the enormous underground golem/deadly magical creature preserve. Cut off from all their high-tech gear, they have to rely on magical items and equipment they find: a dagger that glows blue when danger's near and a pair of dwarven amulets of strength...that only work from the waist down. Their thunder-thighed adventure takes them through lost hunting grounds and across fields of hungry, drop-dead- gorgeous Shroom Nymphs! It's too bad Gina and Penny aren't male...or maybe it isn't!

person_credits.name: Fred Perry
person_credits.role: writer, editor, artist, penciler, letterer, inker, colorist, cover, other

description:
James Bond, 007, and Alec Trevelyan, 006, infiltrate a weapons factory at the ominously named Arkangel. There, whilst attempting to sabotage Russian weapons development, things go drastically wrong, and 006 is killed, whilst Bond escapes in a plane.

Nine years later, Bond encounters the glamorous Xenia Onatopp whilst driving in the hills above Monte Carlo, and a dramatic, thrilling race ensues, though Onatopp wins. Later, Bond returns the 'favour' by defeating her at baccarat, and tries to charm her in his usual manner. She declines, revealing she is already in the company of an Admiral from the Canadian Navy.

However, Onatopp is not merely accompanying the Admiral because she enjoys pulling rank - Whilst making love to the Admiral, she crushes him to death with her thighs, acheiving orgasm in the process. Meanwhile, Bond is informed of some of the lethal woman's past in the KGB.

The next day, Xenia astonishingly accompanies the same Admiral to the unveiling of the Tiger Helicopter, only to steal it from under the noses of all gathered.

We next meet Natalya Federova and Boris Grishenko, two programmers at Severnaya, a Russian Weapons facility. Engaging in a playful bout of insulting Natalya, Boris leaves for a cigarette, just as Onatopp and General Arkady Ouromov - the man who was in charge of the facility 007 and 006 sabotaged - arrive.
name: Goldeneye

description:
The Unholy Legion

A story featuring Captain America and Bucky as they battle a Nazi spy who's disguised as a beggar.

Ivan the Terrible

A story featuring Captain America and Bucky where Cap finds himself a prisoner at the court of Ivan the Terrible. It's up to Captain America and Bucky to restore the rightful king, the father of Betty Ross, to the throne.

The Case of the Fake Money Fiends

A story featuring Captain America and Bucky wherein after receiving a tip, Cap and Bucky must find the whereabouts of a local counterfeiting ring.

Horror Hospital

A story featuring Captain America and Bucky. Buck is injured after foiling a bank robbery, but what he discovers at the hospital is truly horrifying.

Captain America and the Bomb Sight Thieves

A text only story featuring Captain America, his sidekick Bucky, and the Sentinels of Liberty.

The Ogre of the Cave-Dwellers

A story featuring Tuk, caveboy and his friend Tanir the hunter.

The Pirate and the Missing Ships

A story featuring Hurricane.
name: The Unholy Legion

description:
The Ringmaster of Death

A story featuring Captain America and Bucky as they tackle a ringmaster who is plotting to kill important officials that are important to the US war effort.

The Gruesome Secret of the Dragon of Death!

A story featuring Captain America and Bucky while on an assignment in Hawaii, the duo uncover a secret Japanese weapon that could destroy the Pacific fleet.

Killers of the Bund

A story featuring Captain America and Bucky, when Nazi infiltrators nearly kill a loyal German-American citizen, Cap and Bucky decide to track down their camp and shut it down.

Ruby Robbers

A two page text only story featuring Captain America and Bucky.

The Terror that was Devil's Island

A story featuring Captain America and Bucky as one of Steve Rogers' friends has been imprisoned in a brutal prison on Devil's Island, a French territory in the Caribbean, for his opposition to the pro-Nazi Vichy government.

Meet Headline Hunter, Foreign Correspondent

A story featuring the Headline Hunter himself Jerry Hunter.

Weird Stories from the Dark Ages

A story featuring Tuk, caveboy and his friend Tanir the Hunter.

Untitled Story

A story featuring Hurricane.
name: The Ringmaster of Death

description:
The Camera Fiend and His Darts of Doom

A story featuring Captain America and Bucky as they must foil a plot to steal England's crown jewels.

Meet the Fang, Arch-Fiend of the Orient

A story featuring Captain America and his sidekick Bucky as a Japanese operative tries to prevent a Chinese diplomat from appealing to Congress for financial help.

The Grim Reaper Deals With Crime

After his father is executed for a crime he didn't commit, Larry Scott becomes Father Time and vows to fight for justice, beginning with the man responsible for the crime his father was convicted for.

The Strange Case of Captain America and the Hangman: Who Killed Dr. Vardoff?

Captain America and Bucky have a mystery on their hands after a prominent scientist is killed immediately after developing a piece of technology vital to the war effort.

Trap for a Traitor

A two-page text only story featuring Captain America and Bucky.

The Engine of Destruction

A story featuring the Headline Hunter, Jerry Hunter.

The Boarding House of Death

A story featuring the Hurricane.
name: The Camera Fiend and His Darts of Doom

description:
The Red Skull returns and he's looking for revenge on his former minions who have failed him. Can Captain America and Bucky stop him?

  • "The Red Skull" A series of mysterious murders leads Captain America to discover that the Red Skull has returned.
  • "Death Loads the Bases" Cap and Bucky become suspicious following two bizarre deaths at a baseball game.
  • "Horror Plays the Scales" Captain America is on the case again when a senator is killed by a Nazi musician who uses the notes of his violin as a weapon.
  • "Justice Laughs Last" featuring Hurricane (Makkari)
  • "Dust of Destruction" featuring Headline Hunter
  • "Race Against Doom" Father Time must save a man unjustly accused of robbery and murder, but to do so he must discover who was really responsible.
name: The Red Skull

description:
Who is the deadly Ra? The duo of Captain America and Bucky aim to find out.

  • "The Strange Mystery of the Ruby of the Nile and Its Heritage of Horror" An Egyptian ruby seems to be cursed, but what will happen when Captain America gets his hands on it?
  • "Murder Stalks the Maneuvers" Captain America must uncover the truth when real bullets are accidentally used during planned war games maneuvers.
  • "The Strange Riddle of the Plague of Death" featuring Headline Hunter
  • "Case of the Black Witch" Cap and Bucky learn that a woman who must spend three nights in a house to inherit it is being harassed by a witch.
  • "Carnival of Crime" featuring Hurricane (Makkari)
  • "Vault of Doom" Father Time sets out to catch a group of bank robbers who suffocated the tellers at their last heist.
name: The Strange Mystery of the Ruby of the Nile and Its Heritage of Horror

description:
It's horror in the suburbs as the killer White Death strikes!

  • "The White Death" Cap and Bucky investigate a mysterious white-hooded figure who seems to be after the fortune of a deceased millionaire.
  • "The Man Who Could Not Die" Cap must face a seemingly executed man who has found a way to return to his life of crime.
  • "Death in the Alps" featuring Headline Hunter
  • "The Case of the Black Talon" When nearby two artists are found dead, Cap goes on a hunt for their killer: the Black Talon, a mad painter.
  • "Crime Goes to the Press!" featuring Hurricane (Makkari)
  • "The Bombs of Doom!" Father Time discovers a plot to bomb several government officials.
name: The White Death

description:
When a secret weapon is being transported, Captain America and Bucky are tasked with defending it but the Countess has other plans.

  • "Spy Ambush" While transporting a secret cargo from Washington to Camp Lehigh, Cap and Bucky are attacked by Nazi spies.
  • "Hotel of Horror" Cap accepts an invitation to make a publicity appearance in a local city, but receives an unpleasant surprise at his hotel.
  • "A Sinister Scoop!" featuring Headline Hunter
  • "The Phantom Hound of Cardiff Moor" Cap and Bucky learn about the Hound of Cardiff Moor, a ghost that haunts a rich estate nearby, and decide to investigate a murder supposedly perpetrated by it.
  • "The Skyscraper Plot" featuring Hurricane (Makkari)
  • "Beware the Man Who Could Forecast Doom!" Father Time seeks out a fortuneteller who accurately forecast the deaths of several important U.S. officials.
name: Spy Ambush

description: Captain America and Bucky are accused of murder. Can they clear their names and stop the real killer?
name: The Case of the Squad of Mystery; The Feud Murders; A Life at Stake!; The Scourge of Crime!; The Symphony of Terror
